thread.title: 31,000 Lebanese displaced to Syria since the start of the Zionist aggression » Iraqi News Agency
thread.title_full: 31,000 Lebanese displaced to Syria since the start of the Zionist aggression » Iraqi News Agency

author: @ina__news
title: 31,000 Lebanese displaced to Syria since the start of the Zionist aggression » Iraqi News Agency
text: Baghdad - INA The Lebanese government said that 31,000 people have been displaced to Syria since the beginning of the Zionist aggression. A statement by the Disaster Risk Management Unit, it explained that "during the last two days, the General Security recorded the crossing of 15,600 Syrian citizens and 16,130 Lebanese citizens into Syrian territory." It added that "the number of internally displaced persons registered in the shelters approved by the National Operations Room has reached 77,100 displaced persons up to this hour, according to the national platform."
